Text: Thanks a lot. I forgot that this was the season finale. :-(
season 2 starting airing episodes back in Jan 2013 so where the hell is the season 2 episodes herE!?!?!?!?!?!?

@ScarletteSpider, there is no season two (yet), those episodes were the second half of season one. A lot of US networks other than the main four split their shows up into two half-seasons with a several-month break between instead of airing them in a single run.
